introduction: Hi there, in this session I want to talk about one of your past travels. What was your travel destination?
questions: What means of transportation did you use to get there?
Any delicious meals that stood out?
What was your favorite part of the trip?
Did you visit any tourist attractions?
Any surprising memories you can tell me about?
Where you happy with the weather?
Tell me about your travel partners.
Would you recommend the destination to others?
Would you recommend such a trip for families?
Any new experiences that you care to share?
Do you want to revisit any time in the future?
Was it a work inspired trip or for your enjoyment?
For how many days were you away?
